Journal of the Mansion's Last Resident

Date: October 12, 19XX

For the past few months, I have noticed strange occurrences in this house. Things move on their own, doors creak open and closed in the dead of night, and I hear whispers that seem to come from nowhere. I had thought that I was simply imagining things due to the isolation, but now... now I know better.

The curse, I fear, is real. The previous owners were occultists who sealed something dark and ancient in the walls. I cannot leave. The house won't let me. Whoever enters this mansion is trapped, and the curse feeds on their fear. I've tried everything to escape, but nothing works.

I write this now, hoping that someone will read it and understand. Perhaps, if you solve the mystery, the curse can be broken. Good luck.

story: The story takes place in an old, abandoned library filled with forgotten knowledge. The library's ghostly librarian still roams the halls, guarding dark secrets within its shelves.
